newEnemiesForWave

public static java.util.List<Enemy> newEnemiesForWave(int waveNumber)
Create a new wave of enemies from a given wave number.

Uses the Fibonacci sequence to generate the number of enemies for each waveNumber

Parameters:
waveNumber - The current wave
Returns:
A list with enemies, complete with weapons and projectiles

Returns:

Create a weapon list from the weapons specified in the weapons JSON file.

Note: projectiles are created and set to the weapons inside this method.

Parameters:
owner - The weapons' owner
Returns:
A list of weapons with corresponding projectiles

createObjectFromString

public static java.lang.Object createObjectFromString(java.lang.String name,
                                                      java.lang.Class[] constructorParams,
                                                      java.lang.Object[] objectParams)
Create an object dynamically from a name and constructor parameters.

Parameters:
name - The full name of the class (i.e.: "model.weapon.Grenade")
constructorParams - An array of parameters types for the constructor (i.e. Class[] {String.class, int.class}
objectParams - An array of constructor parameter values (i.e. Object[] {"Hello World", 3})
Returns:
The object created, or null if something went wrong (exceptions are catched inside of this method)

createWeaponFromString

public static AbstractWeapon createWeaponFromString(java.lang.String type,
                                                    java.lang.Object[] objectParams)
Create a weapon dynamically from a name.

Parameters:
type - The type of weapon. Must match property "type" in the "weapons.json" file
objectParams - The parameters to send to the constructor
Returns:
A 'type' instance with the type AbstractWeapon

createItemFromString

public static CollidableObject createItemFromString(java.lang.String type,
                                                    java.lang.Object[] objectParams)
Create an item dynamically from a name.

Parameters:
type - The type of item. Must match property "type" in the "items.json" file
objectParams - The parameters to send to the constructor
Returns:
A 'type' instance with the type ICollectableItem
